original_text: And she took it up and went into the city. Her mother-in-law saw what she had gleaned. She also brought out and gave her what food she had left over after being satisfied.
korean_text: 그것을 가지고 성읍에 들어가서 시어머니에게 그 주운 것을 보이고 그가 배불리 먹고 남긴 것을 내어 시어머니에게 드리매

sentences.original_text: Her mother-in-law saw what she had gleaned
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 시어머니는 그녀가 거둔 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: She also brought out and gave her
what food she had left over
